last_episode_to_air.name: Finale
last_episode_to_air.overview: Liza, Harlow, and Oliver embark on their next chapter.

name: Liza on Demand
overview: LIZA ON DEMAND is a half-hour, single camera comedy that follows the chaotic misadventures of Liza, a young woman in Los Angeles who is trying to make a career out of juggling various gig economy jobs — for lack of a better idea of what to do with her life. Meanwhile, Liza's best friends and roommates Oliver and Harlow try their best to both support and sometimes distract her.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: Liza’s getting frustrated juggling all the gigs she has to hold down. Does she have so much side hustle that there’s no time for main hustle? She’s determined to find out, but she's distracted by a sick cat, a jigsaw puzzle, and a trip to the hottest dessert pop up in Los Angeles.

episodes.name: Smile
episodes.overview: Liza feels she’s hit the “task ceiling” when she keeps getting passed over for certain jobs simply because she’s a woman. When she’s harassed on the street by a random dude, Liza decides it’s time to defend her quest for Elite Status.

episodes.name: Popular
episodes.overview: Liza blows off her high school reunion for a plant sitting job, which leads her back to high school anyway…for the do-over she always wanted. Oliver and Harlow do taxes for Harlow’s dog.

episodes.name: Simpler Times
episodes.overview: Liza takes a job as a professional party guest, but this party definitely isn’t one she’d like to be associated with. Meanwhile, Harlow is having trouble tolerating her new chef boyfriend.

episodes.name: Valentine's Day
episodes.overview: It’s the busiest tasking day of the year. Liza juggles a car full of romantic deliveries while trying to decide if that’s something she even wants for herself, since Oliver and Harlow have blown off their “Palentine’s Day” for dates of their own.

episodes.name: MoJoe
episodes.overview: Liza, Oliver and Harlow prepare for Harlow’s birthday party, but Liza needs more time to shop for a gift while she works on a new business venture. She hires an assistant, Beth, who just moved to LA. But Beth may not be all that she seems.

episodes.name: Phuneral
episodes.overview: Liza is hired as a professional mourner and sees an opportunity to fix a long-standing one star rating she’s received. Meanwhile, Harlow asks Oliver to be the guardian of Bark-Paul, and he's not exactly thrilled.

episodes.name: Elite Status
episodes.overview: Liza, Oliver and Harlow have one day to retrace their steps after a drunken night out and find Liza’s missing phone so she can reach Elite Status by midnight.

episodes.name: Naked
episodes.overview: Hoping for more exposure on a dating app, Liza tries a new look — which leaves her more way exposed than she'd ever intended. Oliver pretends to be married to Harlow to keep his new boyfriend interested.

episodes.name: What Up Fam
episodes.overview: Liza works at a DNA testing facility and winds up with new, wealthy relatives who might just be better than her biological family. Oliver and Harlow use Liza's new situation to further their own interests.

episodes.name: Hot, Excited, And In Your Area
episodes.overview: When her image is stolen off of a social media quiz, a frustrated Liza decides to go off the grid. Oliver and Harlow have an adventure in photo manipulation.

episodes.name: Sorry, Not Sorry
episodes.overview: Liza wishes she could break her habit of over-apologizing. Harlow and Oliver train for a trivia tournament.

episodes.name: The Art of Settling
episodes.overview: When considering who to date, Oliver encourages Liza and Harlow to aim lower. But if his new boyfriend is any indication, it seems like Oliver has aimed too low.

episodes.name: Gentrification: The Musical
episodes.overview: Liza decides to help Oliver with a work presentation and quickly takes over, determined to make it a musical sensation.

episodes.name: Maximum Occupancy
episodes.overview: The gang acquires an unwelcome guest when Liza tries to help a client overcome her fear of the outside world on the eve of their "roommate-versary."

episodes.name: Magic Meadows
episodes.overview: Liza tries to reunite the creators of her favorite childhood TV show. Meanwhile, Harlow and Oliver try the latest home-design craze: minimizing.

episodes.name: New Year's Eve: Pt 1
episodes.overview: Liza, Oliver and Harlow set out to have the most epic New Year's Eve ever.

episodes.name: New Year's Eve: Pt 2
episodes.overview: Liza, Oliver and Harlow continue their quest for the perfect New Year's Eve.

episodes.name: Truthousand
episodes.overview: The roommates each confront unusual conspiracy theories.

episodes.name: Beach People
episodes.overview: A month after moving to the west side, the roommates finally spend a day at the beach. Liza, still heartbroken after a breakup, gets stuck working an impossible task, Harlow rebrands as a “beachfluencer”, while Oliver searches for a mythical gay beach.

episodes.name: Hatumentary
episodes.overview: The roommates are the subject of a documentary, and find their lives changed for the better when they each make a bold fashion choice…that threatens to tear them apart.

episodes.name: Wizard of Esme
episodes.overview: Liza goes to work at a global wellness brand, and her roommates think they can solve their problems with free beauty products.

episodes.name: Lice On Demand
episodes.overview: Quarantined due to a lice epidemic, Liza falls in love with the perfect man through his video doorbell, while Harlow and Oliver agree to a very drastic plan in order to leave the apartment.

episodes.name: The Invitation
episodes.overview: The arrival of a wedding invitation causes everyone to question their life choices.

episodes.name: Finale
episodes.overview: Liza, Harlow, and Oliver embark on their next chapter.
